channel.title: Need help with something probly something small (im new at this)
channel.description:
I keep on getting this error: [Nexus] Server is loading.. Error: missing `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components. Press any key to continue . . .
when i go to edit it it shows this: @title Running Nexus @echo off echo [Nexus] Server is loading.. java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause
I found this missing file: "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\client\jvm.dll" but im not sure where to put that...

item.title: Need help with something probly something small (im new at this)
item.dc:creator: @Its_Not_Okay Its Not Okay
item.description:
@Its_Not_Okay wrote:

I keep on getting this error:
[Nexus] Server is loading…
Error: missing server' JVM atC:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll’.
Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components.
Press any key to continue . . .

when i go to edit it it shows this:
@title Running Nexus
@echo off
echo [Nexus] Server is loading…
java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true
pause

I found this missing file: “C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\client\jvm.dll” but im not sure where to put that…

Read full topic
